message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: The Organization Structure is already canceled and cannot be canceled again.
The Organisation Structure is already cancelled and can not be cancelled again.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_RECORD_CANCELED
message.locale: You cannot modify this Organization Structure as it has been canceled.
You can not modify this Organisation Structure as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_ALREADY_ACTIVATED
message.locale: You cannot activate an Organization Structure that is already active.
You can not activate an Organisation Structure that is already active.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_ACTIVATE_CANCELED
message.locale: You cannot activate a canceled Organization Structure.
You can not activate a cancelled Organisation Structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_CANCEL_ACTIVE
message.locale: An active Organization Structure cannot be cancelled.
An active Organisation Structure cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Organization structure name must be entered.
Organisation structure name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_FV_STATUS_EMPTY
message.locale: Organization structure status must be entered.
Organisation structure status must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: An Organization Structure with this name already exists.
Organisation structure name must not be identical to another organisation structure name.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_RV_ORGUNIT_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: There are no organization units to browse in this organization structure.
There are no organisation units to browse in this organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_RV_CLONE_CANCELED_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE
message.locale: Cannot clone a canceled organization structure.
Cannot clone a cancelled organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_RV_ACTIVE_ORGUNITS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete an organization structure that still have active organization units.
Cannot delete an organisation structure that still have active organisation units.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ACTIVE_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An active organization structure already exists.
An active organisation structure already exists.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_ACTIVE_MUST_EXIST
message.locale: An active organization structure must exist.
An active organisation structure must exist.

message.name: INF_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_NO_ROOTORGUNIT_EXISTS
message.locale: No organization units or positions exist in this organization structure.
No organisation units or positions exist in this organisation structure.

message.name: INF_ORGANIZATIONSTRUCTURE_XRV_ONLY_ONE_ACTIVE_CAN_EXIST
message.locale: Only one active organization structure can exist.
Only one active organisation structure can exist
